fields.name: One Luxe
fields.description:
The Nike One Luxe Leggings are our most versatile leggings, made from silky soft fibres that you can't see through. They keep you confidently covered for any workout—and the rest of your day. Part of the Nike Luxe line, these super-comfortable, lightweight leggings are the second skin you'll want to live in. This product is made from at least 50% recycled polyester fibres.

Colour Shown: Black/Clear
Style: AT3098-010

fields.name: Bolt Strength Gorilla Turf with Markings | 2m x 12m (Black, 2 Lanes)
fields.description:
Specs:

Pile height: 25mm.
Tuft density: 21000.
Size: 2*12m/roll.
Color: Black ground and white scale
Lanes: 2
Gross weight: about 70kg/roll.
2.91KG / SQM.

fields.name: Barbell Pad
fields.description:
The protective barbell pad is designed to protect your back, shoulders and also hips depending on the exercise.

Perfect for squats, calf raises, hip thrusts and many more.

At 50 centimeters wide, the shoulder pad is long enough for even the broadest shoulders. The length is designed to give you as much protection as possible without impeding into grip space. The inch thick foam padding also makes resting the bar in between lifts comfortable and practical. This prevents injury to your shoulders, neck and hips.

The pad is sweat repellent due to the outer polyester cover. This makes it very durable. The Velcro closure and pre- molded foam will ensure the pad stays in position during all exercises. It also ensures that it keeps it shape to guarantee many uses. The Velcro closure offers an easy on easy off feature. This takes just seconds to both fit and remove. The hole in the center is big enough for both standard weightlifting bars and Olympic weightlifting bars. It can also be transferred on to your different equipment.

Specifications:
Fits all standard sized bars
Cover increases comfort and durability
Length approx. 50cm
Hole diameter 1″, 2″
Polyester
Pre-moulded foam to retain shape
Ideal for resting in between lifts
Protects neck and shoulders

fields.name: Dumbbell: 5-30KG Bundle
fields.description:
Dumbbell: 5-30KG Bundle (Rack sold separately) 
High quality, durable hex dumbbells that can be used for a wide variety of exercises, and training can be made easier or tougher depending on the weight and number of reps. Dumbbells require more balance and control during exercises compared to barbells or machines, allowing for optimisation of kinaesthetic performance. As well as being an excellent fitness tool, they are tough, durable and safe (with proper technique!).

Material: solid cast material with rubber encasing with contour-gripped, ergonomic steel handles and easy to clean! These are relatively safe dumbbells with a hexagonal shape so they won’t roll away when put down on an uneven surface. This, coupled with the rubber encasing ensures maximum protection from impact damage and also noise reduction. They also facilitate controlled workouts as they are without spinning plates.

Our dumbbells are the perfect tool to take your workout to the next level. They also provide athletes with an effective targeting tool, to work every single muscle! Dumbbells are a must have for any gym environment, home gym and commercial alike. Add the WOW factor to your gym with these great rubber Hex Dumbbells!

Our dumbbells are extremely versatile and can be used for a variety of exercises. They also help to increase stamina and build explosive strength. You can also use our dumbbells for a variety of barbell exercises. They are more compact than a barbell and plates, making them perfect for any space, big or small.

Specifications:
This set contains 11 pairs of dumbbells starting at 5kg and increasing in 2.5kg increments up to 30kg
Benefits:
Available in weights 1-70kg
Reliable
Comfortable hold
Chrome handle with knurling
Reduced impact and noise
Variety of exercises
Anti-roll design
Suitable for home and commercial gyms
Uses:
Single arm rows
Seated shoulder press
Bench press
Dumbbell push-ups
Dumbbell assisted planks
Weighted crunch
Dumbbell side bend
Bench press
Incline fly
Bent-arm pullover
Lateral raises
Shrugs
Military presses
Reverse-fly

fields.name: Dumbbell Set -Adjustable (2 x 15kg)
fields.description:
Brand new Dumbbell set. Includes 2 x Adjustable Dumbbells each which can reach 15kg each

Adjustable Set Contains:
2 x Barbells (1.5kg)
8 x 2.5kg
8 x 1.25kg
4 x Collars
Our adjustable Dumbbells sets are an ideal space saving solution. These dumbbells allow athletes working out at home to carry out exercises at a number of different weights without buying 5-10 sets of dumbbells. Perfect for all fitness levels! The weight can be also be adjusted from 1.5kg up to 15kg per dumbbell.

Dumbbells are easy to store and are a practical addition to any home or professional gym set. You can use them during rigorous exercise or casually while multitasking – lifting while watching television or talking on the phone.

Dumbbells require more balance and control during exercises compared to barbells or machines allowing for optimisation of kinaesthetic performance. Moreover, these dumbbells can be used for a wide variety of both exercises and strength training can be made easier or tougher depending on the weight and number of reps.

Our dumbbells also come with a pair of chrome dumbbell handles, along with cast iron plates. This makes them extremely durable. These dumbbells are also extremely versatile. They can be used for a wide variety of exercises, and therefore are suitable for all fitness levels! These compact dumbbells also make it possible to have many pairs of dumbbells all in one great design!

Our dumbbells make it easy to swap out plates between exercises. This means you can increase the resistance of your workout and gradually build strength. This wider weight range means you can gradually broaden your horizons when training.

Benefits:
Ergonomically designed chrome handles to support tough workouts
Comfortable grip to allow maximum performance
Cast iron plates
Spin-lock collars
Premium dumbbells
Compact and versatile
Two adjustable dumbbells with weights from 1.5kg to 15kg per dumbbell
Possible exercises include: 
Bicep curls
Triceps extensions
Kickbacks
Shoulder presses and rows
Shoulder raises and shrugs
Dumbbell bench presses
Single arm rows
Fly exercises
Ab and back exercises
Seated shoulder press
Lunges
Countless others.

fields.name: Men's Full-Zip Utility Cardigan
fields.description:
This product is excluded from site promotions and discounts.
Made in Milan, with attention to every last detail, this full-zip cardigan brings 360 degrees of luxe comfort into a durable design ready for your travels. A super-soft blend of cotton, silk and cashmere lays flat on your skin for smooth comfort, while expertly crafted patterns are cut, sewn and thoughtfully seamed for mobility and ease of wear. The full-zip design is ultra-versatile and lets you layer and adjust your look on the fly.

fields.name: Easy Clean Off White Fleck -1M tiles
fields.description:
Our best-selling Rubber Gym Flooring now comes with a white fleck. The easy-clean-off white fleck absorbs a huge amount of weight, meaning the impact on the floor below is minimal. This means neither your floor nor equipment will be damaged with use. The flooring is also easily incorporated into any space as it comes in manageable rubber tiles which are easy to lay and alter.

The floor tiles also provide anti-slip protection which is essential in any commercial setting. It will meet the requirements of the most rigorous health & safety standards. The flooring comes in 1m² tile which are 15mm or 20mm thick. The finish is also smooth on the side which is laid upright and comes in sleek black.

Our rubber gym flooring has been designed for heavy use in the gym. These tiles protect the floor from impact and also against heavy machines. They also reduce noise in the gym.

Instructions for Laying:
1. For best results we recommend glueing each gym tile down using a standard floor glue. Consult a local hardware store for further advice.

2. Use a hammer to tap pieces into place.

3. Ensure you are laying each rubber tile on a smooth surface underneath.

–It is not essential to glue down but for best results, it is advised.

fields.name: Paris Saint-Germain Strike Elite Away
fields.description: Designed for players obsessed with perfecting their craft, the Paris Saint-Germain Strike Elite Drill Top is made from advanced sweat-wicking fabric that's strategically placed in high-heat areas to help keep you cool and comfortable.A streamlined design creates a tailored fit that's made to move with you while refining your game.

fields.name: Therma-FIT Run
fields.description: On the Nike Therma-FIT Run Division Hoodie, a soft feel and warm fabric keep your temperature in check when the weather cools. Cuffs that turn into mittens add even more coverage for those chilly days.

fields.name: Men's Pullover Fleece Training Hoodie
fields.description:
The Nike Pro Fleece Hoodie balances warmth with breathability to help you maintain a comfortable temperature while you work out or compete in cooler conditions. Keep your hands free with an innovative pocket designed to hold your things in securely, even during intense activity.

Colour Shown: Iron Grey/Black/Black
Style: DM5889-068

fields.name: Women's Cropped Fleece Hoodie
fields.description:
Take on outdoor workouts or competition in the Nike Pro Therma-FIT ADV Hoodie.Its soft fleece is engineered to help keep you at the right level of warmth in cold weather.

Colour Shown: Thunder Blue/Metallic Silver
Style: DD6328-437

fields.name: Division Phenom Elite
fields.description:
Unwind from busy days with the lightweight warmth of the Nike Therma-FIT Run Division Phenom Elite Trousers. Adjustable ventilation gives you an extra step of cool. Gear up for optimal comfort before, during or after your run.

Colour Shown: Black/Pure/Black
Style: DM4630-010

fields.name: Worthington Essential Short-Sleeve Tee - Plus
fields.description:
The Nike Jacket means you don't have to quit when it's cold and wet. Stretchy, warm fabric holds heat in while wicking sweat to help you stay dry and comfortable. It repels water to keep you dry.

Colour Shown: Black/Black
Style: CU7346-010

fields.name: Slamball (25kg)
fields.description:
Slam Balls are an effective way to increase the intensity of your daily workout regime. By design, the Slam Balls are to be thrown against the walls or floor to build explosive strength. However this versatile tool can also be used like a traditional medicine ball. Used when undertaking squats, lunges and sit-ups, the slamball helps to engage muscle groups and build strength and muscle stamina. The strong interior filling is substantial to maintain the shape of the ball through repeated impact making it ideal for commercial gym use. The limited storage requirements of the Slam Ball also make it an ideal addition to your home gym.

 

Benefits:

Durable and Robust design
Reliable grip surface
Boost cardio stamina
Build Strength and Muscular Endurance
Suitable for home and gym use
PLEASE NOTE: For longevity of this product, we recommend you use on a 30/40mm soft mat. Avoid using the slam ball exercise on any hard service such concrete, astroturf, or grass where stones/glass debris may be present.

The product does not come with a warranty.

fields.name: Power Suspension Trainer
fields.description:
Our Power Suspension Trainer is a specially designed training aid. It effectively targets and strengthens your core muscles while also improving flexibility. These durable straps will also allow the user to be suspended by feet or hands. This forces core engagement consistently throughout the workout and as a result, helps to build strength and endurance.

The versatile nature of our suspension trainer allows the user to undertake a diverse range of exercises. The user can engage multiple muscle groups simultaneously! Our suspension trainer is fully portable, therefore making it easily transported in a carrier bag. This is the perfect product for any indoor or outdoor environment! Does the same job as a trx

This efficient training kit is ideal for those who travel but find it difficult to make time for a busy fitness schedule.

Specifications:

Durable rubber handles
Adjustable strap Carrier Bag
Benefits:

Engage core muscles
Portable to allow workout on the go
Improve strength and flexibility
Suitable for all levels of fitness
 

This product is a home use product and is not suitable for full commercial settings.

Make sure to hang your suspension trainer correctly. Never hang metal to metal.

fields.name: Home Gym Package: Squat Stand , Adjustable Bench , Oly Bar & 100kg Weights
fields.description:
This is by far the best value Home Gym Package on the market in our eyes here at Fitness Equipment Ireland. Our team has been recommending this product to most home buyers for the last number of years and have finally decided to list it on our site as one compact package. Combining an extremely high quality Light Commercial Bench into this package really adds to the quality of the overall package.

The Home Gym Package comes with the following:

Adjustable Squat Stand – Max Load of 100 kg – suitable for completing squats, Olympic Bench Press, Overhead Exercises.
Home Use ADJ Bench
100kg Commercial Grade Bumper Plates
7ft. Olympic Bar (20kg)
This package is so great as it allows you to carry out all of the major exercises everyone wants to do from squats, bench press, incline/decline bench , overhead raises. It truly is a brilliant package.

As well as that it is Compact and easy to store in comparison to larger bulkier power racks.

Quality should also not be of concern with a max load of 150kg on the adjustable stand you can rest assured that this is suitable for heavy lifters also.

fields.name: Women's Running Midlayer
fields.description: Take to the streets in cooler temperatures with this running top. Its 1/2-zip design features a textured material that helps you run without restriction. Built-in thumbholes help extend the coverage.

fields.name: TRX Wall Mount
fields.description: The TRX Wall Mount is the ideal way to mount  you TRX suspension trainer to your wall or ceiling. When mounting the anchor please note you may need to buy your own anchors to make sure the anchor is secured safely in your wall / ceiling. We do include some anchors but as wall vary we can’t guarantee that our anchors are perfect for your wall.

fields.name: Repel Vapor
fields.description: Perfect for drizzly days or dewy mornings, the Nike Repel Vapor Top is made from water-repellent fabric that has plenty of stretch. Its 1/2-length zip closure makes layering a breeze during changing weather. This product is made from at least 75% recycled polyester fibres.

fields.name: 5KG Competition Bumper Plate
fields.description:
ALL PLATES ARE SOLD INDIVIDUALLY

5KG Bolt Strength Competition Bumper Plates are our most premium bumper plates.

In addition, you can adjust the level of endurance and also change resistance levels at any time. Adding and remove the plates on your bar to meet your goals of both defining and building muscle. These bumper plates can be used for a variety of exercises in including targeted arm workouts, squats and also crunches. They also meet all of the international weightlifting federations specifications and standards.

These plates also allow heavy loads to be dropped safely onto platforms and gym floors. In addition, it does this without causing damage to flooring and reducing the amount of bouncing that occurs the following impact.

Perform exercises such as chest press, shoulder press, barbell rows, and many, many more with these versatile plates.  Research indicates that free-weights are the most effective technique to develop muscle strength and also refine muscle definition. The rubber texture of the bumper plates ensure a smooth transition and minimize noise and impact. This makes them an ideal training kit for both home and commercial gym use.

Both the highest quality and aesthetically pleasing plates yet!!

These Premium Plates are also suitable for all Olympic barbells.

 

Available in:
5KG Bolt Strength Competition Bumper Plate
10KG Bolt Strength Competition Bumper Plate
15KG Bolt Strength Competition Bumper Plate
20KG Bolt Strength Competition Bumper Plate
25KG Bolt Strength Competition Bumper Plate
Some possible uses include: 
Deadlifts
Chest press
Barbell rows
Overhead shoulder presses
Many, many more!

fields.name: Cotton Crewneck TShirt
fields.description: This midweight t-shirt from Hanes features ultra-soft cotton for superior comfort you'll reach for everyday.  all-day comfortable fit longer stay-tucked length tagless midweight ComfortSoft cotton fabric cotton washable imported

fields.name: Commercial Suspension Trainer
fields.description:
This is a specially designed training aid. It both effectively targets and strengthens your core muscles while also improving flexibility. These durable straps also allow the user to be suspended by feet or hands. This forces core engagement consistently throughout the workout. As a result, this helps to build strength and endurance.

The versatile nature of our suspension trainer also allows the user to undertake a diverse range of exercises. Therefore, the user can engage multiple muscle groups simultaneously! Our suspension trainer is also fully portable. This makes it easily transported in a carrier bag. This is the perfect product for both indoor or outdoor environments!

This training kit is ideal for those who travel but find it difficult to make time for a fitness schedule.

Specifications:
Durable rubber handles
Adjustable strap Carrier Bag
Benefits:
Engage core muscles
Portable to allow workout on the go
Improve strength and flexibility
Suitable for all levels of fitness
This product is suitable for both light and full commercial settings. If using in a commercial environmental it should be replaced every 12 months for safety.

Make sure to hang your suspension trainer correctly. Never hang metal to metal.

fields.name: Lat Pulldown Bar 36″
fields.description:
Lat Pull Downs have long been one of the most effective back exercises. Great for building strength in back, shoulders and also arms. The Lat Pull Down bar is named after this great exercise and is essential element to a lat pull down. It’s been specifically selected by our team at Fitness Equipment Ireland for our cable attachment range.

This attachment is useful for a number of other exercises and is also extremely versatile. For any athletes looking to carry out a number of wide-arm movements this is your go-to bar. For more information please contact our team here at FEI.

The Lat Pulldown bar is designed with the athlete in mind. Made from chrome, it has special rubber grips to ensure both easy grip and that no damage occurs to hands. It comes in two sizes 36″ and 48″. It is suitable to use with the majority of cable machines including any on our site.

fields.name: Nike Sportswear Swoosh Women's Oversized Fleece Hoodie
fields.description: Made with lounging in mind, the Nike Sportswear Oversized Fleece Hoodie features a roomy design and brushed fleece construction.Set-in Swoosh details wrap around the shoulders for a bold Nike look.

fields.name: Nike Dri-FIT ADV Aura
fields.description: Matching effortless comfort with technical performance, the Nike Dri-FIT ADV Aura Top ticks all the boxes.Soft, lightweight fabric (with plenty of stretch) wicks sweat and dries fast. It's also incredibly breathable with panels of mesh blended into a smooth and virtually seamless design.Feel confident knowing you can take on any workout in comfort.This product is made with at least 75% recycled nylon fibres.

fields.name: Fitness Cable Pulley System
fields.description:
Our home cable pulley system uses high-strength sheathed cable materials. The high durability material leads to a smooth operation. Our fitness pulley cable is also made of heavy-duty steel, which actively resists wear and reduces friction! Moreover, our 360° rotatable silent pulleys are manufactured to ensure that no other noise is generated during while you are using them!

This pulley system can support up to 100kg / 220lb of weight with the loading strap. This is great for users who are just beginning and also for more advanced training.

Easy to assemble & fully portable

Set includes:

1 x steel pulley
1 x steel cable
3 x carabiners
1x heavy duty loading strap
1 x double layer lanyard
1 x tricep strap

fields.name: Yoga Luxe
fields.description:
The Nike Yoga Luxe Fleece Hoodie is made from soft fleece, brushed on both sides for luxurious comfort. The 4-way stretch fabric, spacious fit, dropped shoulders and slight crop give you freedom to move naturally. The all-purpose design lets you wear it before, during or after your next Yoga session.

Colour Shown: Doll/Grey Fog
Style: DM6981-530

fields.name: Pro Dri-FIT
fields.description:
The Nike Pro Dri-FIT Leggings wrap you in stretchy fabric that wicks sweat to keep you feeling supported and dry while you train or compete.This product is made from at least 75% recycled polyester fibres.

Colour Shown: Active Pink/White
Style: DM6936-621

fields.name: Sportswear Swoosh
fields.description: Made with lounging in mind, the Nike Sportswear Oversized Fleece Hoodie features a roomy design and brushed fleece construction.Set-in Swoosh details wrap around the shoulders for a bold Nike look.

fields.name: Single Row Handle
fields.description:
One of the premier products to be added to our cable attachment range, the Single Row Handle is effective for targeting each side of the body separately. Single Row Handles also allow you to carry out one handed exercises. This makes them great for targeting both left and right parts of the body. Moreover, two of the most common exercises used with this attachment are the Single Handed Row and Cable Kick Backs.

Our Single Row Handle can be used with almost any cable machine on the market. This including all cable machines on our site. For more information regarding exercises you can carry out with this please get in touch. The Single Row Handle is made out of hardened chrome and is commercial grade.

fields.name: Nike Sportswear Swoosh Women's Easy Fleece Joggers
fields.description: Look to the Nike Sportswear Easy Fleece Joggers when comfort is required.Their brushed-back fleece has an ultra-cosy, warm feel ready for everyday wear.Set-in Swoosh details on the leg help show love for the brand.

fields.name: 10KG Competition Bumper Plate
fields.description:
ALL PLATES ARE SOLD INDIVIDUALLY

10KG Bolt Strength Competition Bumper Plates are our most premium bumper plates.

in addition, you can adjust the level of endurance and also change resistance levels at any time. Adding and remove the plates on your bar to meet your goals of both defining and building muscle. Perform exercises such as chest press, shoulder press, barbell rows, and many, many more with these versatile plates.  Research indicates that free-weights are the most effective technique to develop muscle strength and also refine muscle definition. The rubber texture of the bumper plates ensure a smooth transition and minimize noise and impact. This makes them an ideal training kit for both home and commercial gym use.

Both the highest quality and aesthetically pleasing plates yet!!

These Premium Plates are also suitable for all olympic barbells.

Specs:
Available in:
5KG Bolt Strength Competition Bumper Plate
10KG Bolt Strength Competition Bumper Plate
15KG Bolt Strength Competition Bumper Plate
20KG Bolt Strength Competition Bumper Plate
25KG Bolt Strength Competition Bumper Plate
Some possible uses include: 
Deadlifts
Chest press
Barbell rows
Overhead shoulder presses
Many, many more!

fields.name: 15KG Competition Bumper Plate
fields.description:
ALL PLATES ARE SOLD INDIVIDUALLY

15KG Bolt Strength Competition Bumper Plates are our most premium bumper plates.

In addition, you can adjust the level of endurance and also change resistance levels at any time. Adding and remove the plates on your bar to meet your goals of both defining and building muscle. These bumper plates can be used for a variety of exercises in including targeted arm workouts, squats and also crunches. They also meet all of the international weightlifting federations specifications and standards.

These plates also allow heavy loads to be dropped safely onto platforms and gym floors. In addition, it does this without causing damage to flooring and reducing the amount of bouncing that occurs the following impact.

Perform exercises such as chest press, shoulder press, barbell rows, and many, many more with these versatile plates.  Research indicates that free-weights are the most effective technique to develop muscle strength and also refine muscle definition. The rubber texture of the bumper plates ensure a smooth transition and minimize noise and impact. This makes them an ideal training kit for both home and commercial gym use.

Both the highest quality and aesthetically pleasing plates yet!!

These Premium Plates are also suitable for all olympic barbells.

Specs:
Diameter: 450mm (IWF strandard).
Insert: Stainless steel.
Bounce: minimal.
Collar opening: 50.40mm.
Weight: 15KG
Colour: Yellow.

fields.name: Men's Full-Zip Jacket
fields.description:
The Nike Yoga Dri-FIT Jacket is a soft, light layer that keeps you comfortably covered before, during and after your practice.This product is made from at least 75% recycled polyester fibres.

Colour Shown: Off-Noir/Black
Style: CZ2217-010

fields.name: Giannis 'Freak'
fields.description: Freak out with the MVP in this Giannis Long-Sleeve T-Shirt.It's made from structured heavyweight cotton with a loose fit.Graphics put a new shine on Giannis's sensational Swoosh "Freak" logo.

fields.name: Women's Ribbed Cover-Up
fields.description:
The Nike Yoga Luxe Cover-Up is a cosy layer that gets you to and from the mat in the warmth and super-soft feel of fuzzy ribbed fleece.It defines luxury with a balance of narrow and wide ribbing that creates a multi-textured look.

Colour Shown: Black/Heather/Smoke Grey
Style: DD5828-010

fields.name: Nike Air
fields.description: The Nike Air Joggers update a fleece favourite with an athletic look and reflective-design Air graphics. A roomy fit and elastic details at the waist and cuffs provide a carefree, comfortable feel.

fields.name: Dri-FIT Icon Clash
fields.description: Bring it back home in our Icon Clash Top. It's got smooth, sweat-wicking fabric that'll keep you feeling cool when the tempo heats up. We added a watch window on the sleeves so you can keep track of your time without missing a step. Flowery graphics at the shoulders nod to the joys of wherever we go to rest and recover after a long run.

fields.name: Nike Sportswear Men's T-Shirt
fields.description: The classic cotton T-shirt gets a sleek update.Nike branding runs down each shoulder, making this tee easy to pair with joggers or basketball shorts for a casual look.This product is made from at least 75% organic cotton fibres.

fields.name: Men's Fleece Joggers
fields.description:
Our Nike Sportswear Joggers are made from soft, brushed fleece for smooth comfort. These relaxed-fit, slightly tapered trousers bring you effortless style you can wear almost anywhere.

Colour Shown: White Onyx/White
Style: DM5626-268

fields.name: Nike Sportswear Club Fleece
fields.description: From the workweek to weekend fun, our sateen cropped pants are a perfect way to make sure you're always flaunting a put-together look. zipper closure 2 front slash pockets 2 faux back pockets 18" inseam black white print: cotton/polyester/spandex all others: cotton/nylon/spandex washable imported

fields.name: 1-Piece Pad Sports Bra
fields.description: The Nike Swoosh Sports Bra has a classic design with sweat-wicking technology to help keep you dry and comfortable during medium-impact activities.A racerback design lets you move naturally when you're going for it.This product is made from at least 50% recycled polyester fibres.

fields.name: Nike Sportswear Tech Fleece
fields.description: The Nike Sportswear Tech Fleece Full-Zip Hoodie updates a layering staple with woven overlays for a durable construction. Made from Tech Fleece, it features soft knit fabric that has a premium feel.

fields.name: Nike Sportswear Favourites
fields.description: The Nike Sportswear Favourites Dance Leggings feel soft and stretchy to match all your moves as you play and have fun.With a fun print that brings the energy to every look—we're totally in.

fields.name: Women's M65 Woven Jacket
fields.description: Inspired by the utility of the iconic M65 jacket, the Nike Sportswear Woven Jacket features 4 flap pockets and a mock neck design complete with a storm flap closure.Its weather-resistant fabric, woven with at least 75% recycled fibres, makes it an ideal layering piece in cool, wet weather.This product is made from 100% recycled polyester fibres.

fields.name: Dri-FIT Academy
fields.description: The Nike Dri-FIT Academy Drill Top is made from stretchy, sweat-wicking fabric to help you stay comfortable when practising your skills.Plus, hidden thumbholes help hold your sleeves in place as you move.This product is made from 100% recycled polyester fibres.

fields.name: Dri-FIT Fast
fields.description:
Make those miles count in our remixed Fast leggings, with a vibrant, textured graphic that visually accentuates your movement while you run. Stretchy, sweat-wicking support gives you smooth coverage for long and short routes. Plus, there are plenty of pockets to secure a key or phone. This product is made from at least 75% recycled polyester fibres.

Colour Shown: Pink Prime/Active Pink
Style: DM7318-642

fields.name: Rope De Dope
fields.description: Cold conditions are just an invitation for new discovery. The Nike Therma-FIT ADV ACG "Rope De Dope" Jacket has innovative technology combined with an insulated, water-repellent design for comfort tailored to all conditions. Made from at least 75% recycled polyester and nylon fibres, it's got a lightweight and loose feel designed to layer and can be easily packed and stored in a pocket. The all-over glacier print is inspired by our trip to Iceland.

fields.name: Air Max
fields.description:
Your favourite casual trousers get an upgrade.The premium fleece has a washed, lived-in feel while the clean lines and pintuck detailing bridge the gap between your go-to tracksuit bottoms and a return to the office.

Colour Shown: Black/Black/Black
Style: DJ5078-010

fields.name: Sportswear Swoosh
fields.description:
Enjoy a comfortable, familiar feel perfect for everyday wear in these high-rise leggings. Soft and supportive, their jersey fabric moves with you for a distraction-free fit.

Colour Shown: Black/Black/White
Style: DN5039-010

fields.name: Long Johns
fields.description:
Casual and comfortable, the Nike Sportswear Trousers have a tapered design that falls right at the ankle. They're made from a soft, lightweight fabric to help keep you comfortable wherever your day takes you.

Colour Shown: Particle Grey
Style: DO0022-073

fields.name: Dri-FIT Epic Luxe
fields.description:
Maintain your pace with the soft and breathable Nike Epic Luxe Leggings. Made from Nike's highest-quality fabric, they have a lightweight, secure fit and feel. Easy-access pockets hold a key or card along for the journey.

Colour Shown: Particle Grey/Black/Cool Grey
Style: DM7376-073

fields.name: F.C. Dri-FIT
fields.description:
The Nike F.C. Dri-FIT Pants are made with sweat-wicking fabric to help keep you cool and comfortable whether you're training or keeping things casual. This product is made from at least 75% recycled polyester fibres.

Colour Shown: Black/White/White
Style: DC9016-010

fields.name: Therma
fields.description:
Made from insulating, sweat-wicking fabric, the Nike Therma Hoodie feels soft and warm on the way to and from the gym.A zip pocket holds your phone.This product is made from at least 50% recycled polyester fibres.

Colour Shown: Obsidian/Brigade Blue/Heather/Black
Style: CU6231-452

fields.name: Dri-FIT Academy
fields.description: The Nike Dri-FIT Academy Drill Top is made from stretchy, sweat-wicking fabric to help you stay comfortable when practising your skills.Plus, hidden thumbholes help hold your sleeves in place as you move.This product is made from 100% recycled polyester fibres.

fields.name: Tennis Dress
fields.description: Designed to perform at the highest levels of play, the Naomi Osaka Dress pairs innovative fabric with thoughtfully placed mesh and criss-cross straps.The result is a cool, comfortable silhouette that's ready for whatever the match throws your way.

fields.name: Essential
fields.description: Keep extra cosy in this fuzzy, fleece-like jacket. Woolly fabric and an oversized fit are combined to offer plenty of room to move and layer comfortably. A slight crop makes it a natural fit for your favourite high-rise leggings and trousers.

fields.name: Women's Graphic Training Crew
fields.description:
The Nike Dri-FIT Crew layers easily over your workout clothes to help keep you warm and dry.Faux rhinestone Swoosh designs on the front and back bring a little lustre to your workout.

Colour Shown: Midnight Navy/Metallic Silver
Style: DD5467-410

fields.name: Nike Pro Men's Tights
fields.description: The Nike Pro Tights give you a high-stretch layer of support so you can focus on your workout.

fields.name: Blue Chew
fields.description: Our Nike Sportswear Crew is made from soft, brushed fleece for smooth comfort. This relaxed-fit, classic design brings you effortless style you can wear almost anywhere.

fields.name: 7ft Olympic Bar (20KG) 500lb
fields.description:
Olympic Grade Lifting Bar-

Top-quality Olympic Bar made from high carbon steel
Light commercial bearing up to 500lbs
Harden Chrome
Suitable for Olympic Plates centre 51mm only
Collars included
Features:

Diameter: 51mm
Bearing: 500lbs
Weight: 20kg
Perfect for

Static lifts such as bench press, squats and shrugs. If you are doing a lot of olympic lifts/deadlifts and the bar is being dropped a lot, we would advise going for our Crossfit Bar.

fields.name: Yoga Nomad
fields.description:
Get into the flow of your workout with the Nike Yoga Nomad Hoodie. Soft, stretchy fabric is made from a blend of at least 75% recycled and organic fibres and keeps you covered and moving comfortably.

Colour Shown: Black
Style: CZ2219-010

fields.name: Women's Fleece Training Sweatshirt
fields.description:
Stay warm before and after your workout in the Nike Therma-FIT Sweatshirt.Thick, fuzzy fleece fits easily over your outfit to keep you comfortable.Cinch it in at the bottom to keep out the cold.

Colour Shown: Gypsy Rose/White
Style: DD6487-622

fields.name: Blue Chew Leggings
fields.description: Our Nike Sportswear Joggers are made from soft, brushed fleece for smooth comfort. These relaxed-fit, slightly tapered trousers bring you effortless style you can wear almost anywhere.

fields.name: Nike Sportswear Essentials
fields.description: Baggy through the body and hips, this oversized sweatshirt is great for warming up, cooling down or chilling out. Thick, heavyweight fleece is soft and warm while Nike heritage logos give it a vintage feel.

fields.name: Paris Saint-Germain Men's MA-1 Jacket
fields.description: Luxury details with a classic varsity vibe. The Paris Saint-Germain MA-1 Jacket is made using smooth satin inside and out, with lightweight insulation for warmth and stretchy ribbing detail.

fields.name: Nike Brasilia 9.5
fields.description: The Nike Brasilia Backpack gives you plenty of organised space to keep your gear in check and ready for your next adventure, even if that's just getting to and from school or the gym. The durable design is made to hold up for everyday use. This product is made from at least 50% recycled polyester fibres.

fields.name: Jordan Jumpman
fields.description: Stay fresh with the Jordan Duffel Bag. It has a large main compartment for carrying your clothes and gear wherever you go.

fields.name: Nike Heritage
fields.description: You've got a new partner with the Nike Heritage Waistpack. Perfect for daily essentials that don't quite fit in your pockets, its main space has an internal zipped stash pocket to keep smaller items organised and easy to grab. This product is made from at least 65% recycled polyester fibres.
